item.title: Couple needed to film a UGC video for a social media app - Upwork
item.description:
URGENT! Delivery within 24h upon receiving brief, no editing needed.
Looking for a couple to film an easy skit-like UGC video for a social media app.  Estimated film time less than 30min
Script will be provided

Requirements:
· Native speaker of American English
· ·Upbeat voice tone
· Fun & energetic vibe, able to be expressive with acting
· Experience with Tik Tok/ Youtube

Budget: $450
Posted On: June 16, 2024 01:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video
Skills: UGC, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply
